Posts.Content: I was on Aromasin for about 18 months, when I was in so much pain I could barley walk and my feet are in excrutiating pan 24/7.  I have swittched to femera and am having the same  symptoms.  I don't know what to do.  I can't go on like this.  All of my joints hurt, I am short of breadth and and sooo tired all of the time, but the foot pain is the worst.  Help!
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
